thread.title: BRIEF-Helios And Matheson Analytics Announces Proposed Public Offering Of Common Stock

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Helios And Matheson Analytics Announces Proposed Public Offering Of Common Stock

organizations.name: matheson analytics announces proposed public offering of common stock feb

text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Helios And Matheson Analytics Inc :
* HELIOS AND MATHESON ANALYTICS ANNOUNCES PROPOSED PUBLIC OFFERING OF COMMON STOCK AND WARRANTS
* HELIOS AND MATHESON ANALYTICS INC - ‍COMPANY MAY ALSO USE PROCEEDS TO MAKE OTHER ACQUISITIONS​
* HELIOS AND MATHESON ANALYTICS INC - ‍SHARES OF COMMON STOCK AND WARRANTS TO PURCHASE SHARES OF COMMON STOCK ARE BEING OFFERED AS UNITS​
* HELIOS AND MATHESON ANALYTICS INC - ‍MAY USE NET PROCEEDS FROM THIS OFFERING TO INCREASE COMPANY‘S OWNERSHIP STAKE IN MOVIEPASS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
